alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Roger Mills; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:08AM CDT until July 09 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washita County in western Oklahoma... Northern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Custer County in western Oklahoma... Southern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Western Canadian County in central Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 208 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Greenfield to 3 miles north of Hammon to 5 miles southwest of Sweetwater, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Weatherford, Clinton, Sayre, Cordell, Hinton, Burns Flat, Geary, Thomas, Erick, Hydro, Sentinel, Arapaho, Hammon, Dill City, Canute, Calumet, Corn, Custer City, and Eakly. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Roger Mills; Washita
